peregrine.rpc
Class RpcClient

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.rpc.RpcClient

public class RpcClient
extends java.lang.Object

Basic RPC client for sending messages to peregrine workers.

Invoke an RPC method and block. Return a Message object which represents the result and is parsed.

invoke

public <T> T invoke(Host host,
                    java.lang.String service,
                    java.lang.String url,
                    java.lang.Object message,
                    java.lang.Class<T> resultType)
         throws java.io.IOException
Invoke a method via JSON RPC.

Parameters:
message - The object to be encoded as JSON. Should be a POJO.
resultType - If JSON is returned, we construct it and return it via the resultType.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
